data.description: Now voice control all your smart home devices from the comfort of your lounger. With Meeami far-field technology that includes state-of-the-art multi-mic beamforming, noise suppression, and acoustic echo cancellation, your smart speakers can respond to you even under noisy conditions and from a distance of more than 5 meters.
data.heading: MEEAMI
data.title: Far Field Enhancement

cards.description: Our cutting-edge beamforming technology redefines sound capture in far-field environments. With the flexibility to choose from 2, 4, or 6 microphones, our solution excels in scenarios where audio needs to be captured accurately from a distance.
cards.title: Beamforming: 2/4/6 mic beamforming solution for far field

cards.description: Our state-of-the-art Echo Canceller is engineered to provide uninterrupted conversations, even in high-volume settings, all while being finely tuned for Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) systems.
cards.title: Echo Canceller: Barge-in at high volumes with echo canceller tuned for ASR

cards.description: Our innovative Wake-Up Word technology is designed for versatility, seamlessly integrating with a wide range of wake-up word engines and Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR) systems
cards.title: Wake-up Word: technologies tuned to work with any wake-up word engine and ASR

cards.description: Our Custom Commands technology is engineered to provide a finely tuned and responsive experience for executing local commands. Whether it's controlling smart devices in your home, navigating through applications, or managing your vehicle's systems.
cards.title: Custom Commands: Technologies  tuned for local command performance

data.description: Unlock the power of audio AI with our state-of-the-art tool designed to revolutionize your sound experiences. Embrace the future of sound with our audio AI tool and discover a world of endless possibilities at your fingertips.
data.heading: Explore
data.title: Try it now to transform your soundscapes like never before.

data.heading: Meeami
data.title: Far Field Enhancement
data.description: Our Far Field Enhancement technology redefines voice command usability, making it possible to issue commands and interact with devices from distances of up to 5 meters, even in noisy surroundings.
